builtInTemplates.name: Big Win Breakdown
builtInTemplates.description: Deep dive analysis of your most successful trades

blocks.title: The Winning Trade
blocks.prompt: Describe the setup, entry, and execution of your best trade today
blocks.placeholder: What made this trade stand out? Walk through your thought process from setup identification to exit...

blocks.title: What Made It Work
blocks.prompt: Which specific skills or decisions led to this success?
blocks.placeholder: Was it your patience, technical analysis, risk management, or emotional control? Be specific...

blocks.title: How to Replicate
blocks.prompt: What patterns can you systematize for future trades?
blocks.placeholder: What rules or criteria can you extract from this success to repeat it consistently?

blocks.title: Scaling the Approach
blocks.prompt: How can you apply this success to larger positions or more setups?
blocks.placeholder: How might you scale this strategy while maintaining the same risk profile?

builtInTemplates.name: Loss Review & Learning
builtInTemplates.description: Extract maximum value from losing trades

blocks.title: The Losing Trade
blocks.prompt: What happened with your worst trade today?
blocks.placeholder: Describe the setup, your reasoning, and how the trade played out...

blocks.title: Where It Went Wrong
blocks.prompt: What specific mistakes led to this loss?
blocks.placeholder: Was it poor entry timing, lack of patience, ignoring signals, or something else?

blocks.title: Lessons Learned
blocks.prompt: What can you learn to prevent this pattern?
blocks.placeholder: What knowledge or skill can you develop to avoid this mistake in the future?

blocks.title: Prevention System
blocks.prompt: What rules or alerts will help you avoid this mistake?
blocks.placeholder: Create specific, actionable rules you can follow to prevent this from happening again...

builtInTemplates.name: Mindset Reset
builtInTemplates.description: Focus on mental game and emotional control

blocks.title: Current Mental State
blocks.prompt: How are you feeling emotionally and mentally right now?
blocks.placeholder: Describe your emotional state, stress level, confidence, and overall mental clarity...

blocks.title: Stress Triggers
blocks.prompt: What situations or thoughts created stress today?
blocks.placeholder: Identify specific moments, trades, or thoughts that triggered negative emotions...

blocks.title: Positive Reframes
blocks.prompt: How can you view today's challenges differently?
blocks.placeholder: Reframe setbacks as learning opportunities and find the silver lining in difficult moments...

blocks.title: Mental Prep for Tomorrow
blocks.prompt: What mindset will serve you best tomorrow?
blocks.placeholder: Set your mental intention and attitude for tomorrow's trading session...

generateInsightTemplate.systemPrompt: You are an expert trading coach and psychologist specializing in trader development and insight generation. Based on trading day context, generate customized reflection prompts that explore both mindset and execution.

blocks.title: What Triggered the Revenge
blocks.prompt: What specific moment or loss made you want to 'get back' at the market?

blocks.title: Emotional State Check
blocks.prompt: How did anger or frustration affect your decision-making process?

blocks.title: Damage Assessment
blocks.prompt: What was the real cost of trading emotionally today?
